definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The Company for Trade and Industry Branch of the Hi-Tech enterprise integration.
sentences.chinese: 本公司为科工贸一体化的高科企业。

sentences.english: The invention is a microminiature high rotating speed tool shank, relating to electromechanical integration field.
sentences.chinese: 本发明为一种微小型高转速刀柄，属机电一体化领域。

sentences.english: And last, cultural industry needs to be expanded and economic culture integration carried forward.
sentences.chinese: 第四要拓展文化产业，推进经济文化一体化。

sentences.english: Evonik benefits specifically from its innovative prowess and integrated technology platforms.
sentences.chinese: 赢创的发展得益于其创新实力和一体化技术平台。

sentences.english: Europeanization and European Integration are two central terms in the EU study.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲化和一体化是欧盟研究的两个核心概念。

sentences.english: Economic regionalization is an important trend in the development of world Economy.
sentences.chinese: 区域经济一体化是世界经济发展的一个重要趋势。

sentences.english: The indicator light is integral with switch cover and standardly furnished.
sentences.chinese: 标准配置包括与开关盖一体化的指示灯。

sentences.english: A type of recovery booth that incorporates a cartridge filter system to collect overspray powder.
sentences.chinese: 一个过滤收集过喷粉末的一体化装置。

sentences.english: TELS designed assessments to measure knowledge integration about the module topics.
sentences.chinese: TELS设计，评估，以衡量知识模块的主题一体化。

sentences.english: Thus the integration of instrument, electric and control for spinning production is implemented.
sentences.chinese: 实现了纺丝生产的仪电控制一体化。

sentences.english: It's an inexorable trend to construct the leaming-oriented society following the organic whole of the world economy and culture.
sentences.chinese: 建设学习型社会，是世界经济文化一体化的必然趋势。

sentences.english: It can be predicted that this point of view will form the new standard of machinery-electronics unitization products.
sentences.chinese: 并将形成机电仪一体化智能产品新的标准规范。

sentences.english: Feeding the regional economy of towns , are the ties of urban-rural integration.
sentences.chinese: 小城镇反哺区域经济，是城乡一体化的纽带。
全球主义与全球一体化？

sentences.english: These differences make it very difficult to have one-size-fits-all rules for all occasions.
sentences.chinese: 这些不同使所有地区制度一体化的实现难度很大。

sentences.english: Dual CPU integrating programming and control, programming is available when machining.
sentences.chinese: 双CPU结构编程控制一体化，加工时可以同机编程。

definition: informatization (the Information Age analog of industrialization)
